data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
An attacking Alkmaar player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
In the minute 33, Joel Drommel (Enschede) has received a first yellow card.
Goal! Alkmaar take a 0-1 lead thanks to a Teun Koopmeiners spot-kick..
Yukinari Sugawara puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
In the minute 43, Jesper Karlsson instrumental with a fine assist.
The first-half has come to a close in Enschede.
The second-half is underway at Grolsch Veste Stadium.
In the minute 46, Ron Jans (Enschede) is making a first substitution, with Jayden Oosterwolde replacing Gijs Smal.
Halil Dervisoglu is replacing Vaclav Cerny for Enschede at Grolsch Veste Stadium.
Enschede have been given a penalty at Grolsch Veste Stadium...
In the minute 73, Danilo's spot-kick reduces the deficit 1-2.
Ron Jans is making the team's third substitution at Grolsch Veste Stadium with Alexander Jeremejeff replacing Julio Pleguezuelo.
The home team have replaced Luka Ilic with Jesse Bosch. This is the fourth substitution made today by Ron Jans.
In the minute 86, Pascal Jansen is making the team's first substitution at Grolsch Veste Stadium with Ferdy Druijf replacing Myron Boadu.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-3.
Jayden Oosterwolde (Enschede) is red-carded and dismissed.
At Grolsch Veste Stadium, Danilo has been yellow-carded for the home team.
